aboutContent.title: Welcome to Munich Quiz!
aboutContent.text: Munich Quiz is a modern single-page application designed for anyone curious about Munich. Explore the city through 10 interactive and visually engaging multiple-choice questions, each featuring vivid images of landmarks, historical sites, and cultural highlights. With a user-friendly interface, instant feedback, and smooth animations, Munich Quiz makes learning about the city exciting and enjoyable. Perfect for a quick challenge or casual exploration, the quiz lets you test your knowledge and discover Munich’s rich history and iconic attractions in an entertaining and informative way.

questions.question: Where do tourists gather in Munich to see the Glockenspiel at the New Town Hall?
What is the name of Munich’s main cathedral, visible from almost anywhere in the city?
Which Bavarian king was born in Nymphenburg Palace?
Why is Munich’s English Garden called that?
options: It was built by the English
It was designed in the style of an English landscape park
An English festival is held there every year
questions.answer: It was designed in the style of an English landscape park
